chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: stack
R: stack
y: string
x: string

Goal:
rewt R x y -> R <<= P -> rewt P x y

Premises:
Inductive rewt (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> Prop := rewR : forall z : SR.string X, rewt R z z | rewS : forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> rewt R x z Arguments rewt {X}%type_scope Arguments rewR {X}%type_scope Arguments rewS {X}%type_scope
stack = list card : Type
string = SR.string nat : Type
rewt_induct : forall (R : SRS) z (P : string -> Prop), P z -> (forall x y, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y -> P x) -> forall s : SR.string nat, rewt R s z -> P s
rewt_sind : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> SProp), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z) -> (forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> P s s0
rewt_ind : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> Prop), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z) -> (forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> P s s0
rewt_ind' : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> Prop), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z (rewR R z)) -> (forall (x y z : SR.string X) (r : rew R x y) (r0 : rewt R y z), P y z r0 -> P x z (rewS R x y z r r0)) -> forall (s s0 : SR.string X) (r : rewt R s s0), P s s0 r
rewt_app_L : forall R x x' y, rewt R x x' -> rewt R (y ++ x) (y ++ x')
SR = fun '(R / x / y) => rewt R x y : SR.SRS nat * SR.string nat * SR.string nat -> Prop
rewS : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (x0 y0 z : SR.string ?X), rew R0 x0 y0 -> rewt R0 y0 z -> rewt R0 x0 z where ?X : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- Type]
Proper_rewt : forall R, Proper (rewt R ==> rewt R ==> rewt R) (app (A:=symbol))
SRH = fun '(R / x / a) => exists y : SR.string nat, rewt R x y /\ a el y : SR.SRS nat * SR.string nat * nat -> Prop
Wf_nat.well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
rewR : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (z : SR.string ?X), rewt R0 z z where ?X : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- Type]
Wf_nat.induction_ltof2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (P : A -> Type), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, Wf_nat.ltof A f y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
Wf_nat.induction_gtof2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (P : A -> Type), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, Wf_nat.gtof A f y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
Fin.L_R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- nat]
PeanoNat.Nat.double_induction : forall R : nat -> nat -> Prop, Proper (eq ==> eq ==> iff) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n : nat, R (S n) 0) -> (forall n m : nat, R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, R n m
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : Fin.t (S ?n)) (P0 : Fin.t (S ?n) -> Type), P0 Fin.F1 -> (forall p0 : Fin.t ?n, P0 (Fin.FS p0)) -> P0 p where ?n : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- nat]
TSR = fun '(R / x / y) => rewt (R ++ [swap p | p ∈ R]) x y : SR.SRS nat * SR.string nat * SR.string nat -> Prop
TSRH = fun '(R / x / a) => exists y : SR.string nat, rewt (R ++ [swap p | p ∈ R]) x y /\ a el y : SR.SRS nat * SR.string nat * nat -> Prop
PCP.MPCPb = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : PCP.stack bool, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ PCP.tau1 A = y ++ PCP.tau2 A : PCP.card bool * PCP.stack bool -> Prop
PCP.MPCP = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : PCP.stack nat, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ PCP.tau1 A = y ++ PCP.tau2 A : PCP.card nat * PCP.stack nat -> Prop
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, x el l -> P x)
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
rewB : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (x0 y0 : list ?X) (u v : SR.string ?X), u / v el R0 -> rew R0 (x0 ++ u ++ y0) (x0 ++ v ++ y0) where ?X : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- Type]
Exists_exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Exists P l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ P x)
incl_Forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l2 <<= l1 -> Forall P l1 -> Forall P l2
incl_Exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> Exists P l1 -> Exists P l2
VectorDef.caseS : forall P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P0 n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P0 n v where ?A : [R : stack P : stack x : string y : string |- Type]
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P [] | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Le.le_elim_rel : forall P : nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall p : nat, P 0 p) -> (forall p q : nat, p <= q -> P p q -> P (S p) (S q)) -> forall n m : nat, n <= m -> P n m
Inductive rew (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> Prop := rewB : forall (x y : list X) (u v : SR.string X), u / v el R -> rew R (x ++ u ++ y) (x ++ v ++ y) Arguments rew {X}%type_scope Arguments rewB {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Between.exists_between_ind : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall l : nat, Between.exists_between Q k l -> P l -> P (S l)) -> (forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> P (S l)) -> forall n : nat, Between.exists_between Q k n -> P n
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
BinInt.Z.ge = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.ge (_ _)%Z_scope
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Arguments Decidable.decidable _%type_scope
in_in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> x el l -> x el remove eq_dec y l
Fin.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t n -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1 Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (f : Fin.t n), P (S n) Fin.F1 (Fin.FS f)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f : Fin.t n), P (S n) (Fin.FS f) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (f g : Fin.t n), P n f g -> P (S n) (Fin.FS f) (Fin.FS g)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Fin.t n), P n a b
incl_lrcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= x :: B -> ~ x el A -> A <<= B
PeanoNat.Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
filter_pq_mono : forall (X : Type) (p q : X -> bool) (A : list X), (forall x : X, x el A -> p x = true -> q x = true) -> filter p A <<= filter q A
